price: (40) That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant?"
arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: laʿallanā nattabiʿu al-saḥarata in kānū humu al-ghālibīna
